job.title: Machine Learning Engineer

digitization and prediction of materials data and inventory for complex supply chains The companys AI software harmonizes disparate material data across ERP instancessystems while providing accurate MDM across the enterprise to optimize inventory costs Intelligent controls enforce inventory procedures to help prevent future inventory spikes while predictive capabilities optimize allocation and procurement needs The result is a data foundation you can trust to move quickly to innovate and support related Industry 40 initiativesbrbrVerusen is venturebacked by leading investors from San Francisco to Boston and is a Signature Company at Georgia Techs Advanced Technology Development Center ATDC Partnerships including SAP and Accenture Verusen is a portfolio company of brbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongAs a Machine learning QE engineer you will work closely with Product Management and Data science to understand how to evaluate and monitor our ML pipelines The successful MLQA has a strong technical aptitude and is obsessed with continuous quality improvement in the ML field they are experienced and highly committed to creating worldclass automation for feature testing and regression for different ML modelsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongDesign develop execute and maintain manual and automated tests and monitors for machinelearning pipelinesbrbrWork closely with front end QE to ensure that highquality data is presented to customersbrbrUnderstanding of machine learning techniques data structures algorithms statisticsbrbrWork crossfunctionally with other QEs developers and product managersbrbrDrive research of industry trends and apply best practices in quality engineering practices used in evolving machine learning techniquesbrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongBachelors Degree in Computer Science Engineering preferredbrbr12 years of experience in Machine Learning algorithmsbrbrUnderstanding how machine learning algorithms are evaluated and how models are comparedbrbrFamiliarity with monitoring AI pipelinesbrbrExpertise in automation suites frameworks for verification of distributed systems and machine learning models such as Amazon Sagemaker or Google DataLabbrbrDemonstrated ability to learn and apply new technology tools and processesbrbrAnalytical mindset and detailoriented approach to problemsolvingbrbrPositive approach good culture fit and a passion for Quality Engineering and automationbrbrGood communication skillsbrbrSupply Chain experience a plusbrbrRapid Growth andor Startup
